topic.title: PATIENT SPECIFIC INSTRUMENTS INDICATOR (SHOULDER OR KNEE REPLACEMENT)
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether specific instruments were used for a PATIENT for Primary Shoulder Replacement Surgery, Revision Shoulder Replacement Surgery, Primary Knee Replacement Surgery or Revision Knee Replacement Surgery.
